statements: ALTER TABLE biometric_data ADD COLUMN location VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE user_info DROP COLUMN age;
ALTER TABLE user_info MODIFY COLUMN gender VARCHAR(20);
ALTER TABLE biometric_data ADD COLUMN gender VARCHAR(10);
ALTER TABLE user_data ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50);
ALTER TABLE device_data DROP COLUMN user_id;
ALTER TABLE UserBiometrics ADD COLUMN height INT
ALTER TABLE HeartRateData ADD COLUMN activity VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE BloodPressureData ADD COLUMN notes TEXT
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE fingerprints DROP COLUMN timestamp
ALTER TABLE face_recognition MODIFY COLUMN face_data BYTEA[]
